titles.title: Repeal of Federal Reserve Board Term Limitation Act
To amend the Federal Reserve Act to permit members of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to be appointed to more than 1 term of office.
Repeal of Federal Reserve Board Term Limitation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Repeal of Federal Reserve Board Term Limitation Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to repeal the term limitation on Federal Reserve Board membership.
Provides that any member of the Board who has served a full term of 14 years is eligible for reappointment to a five-year term.
